Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class GameStateManager.SaveState

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GameStateManager.SaveState
Enclosing class:
GameStateManager
public static class GameStateManager.SaveState extends Object
Represents a complete snapshot of the game state at a moment in time. Contains everything needed to restore the game exactly as it was when saved: level, score, player state, enemy positions, items on the ground, etc.
